definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Where a director encounters barriers when he normally exercises his power, he shall report it to the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 董事正常行使職權遇到障礙，應當向中國保監會報告。

sentences.english: I feel this is meddlesome , if be proper exercise powers and authorities of office, what are you afraid of?
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這是好事，如果是正當行使職權，你怕什麼？

sentences.english: Whether factory has the quality the director general, independently exercises authority to the product quality.
sentences.chinese: 工廠是否有質量總監，對產品質量獨立行使職權。

sentences.english: The board of shareholders is the company's governing body, and shall exercise its powers in accordance with this Law.
sentences.chinese: 股東會是公司的權力機構，依照本法行使職權。

sentences.english: Whether there is independence the quality control for exercising authority personnel?
sentences.chinese: 是否有獨立行使職權的質量控制人員？
